Constructor Detail

ClassLoaderUtil

Method Detail

getThreadClassLoader

public static java.lang.ClassLoader getThreadClassLoader()
Returns:
The current thread's ClassLoader (the loader than spawned the thread). Ex: Tomcat's server class loader is different than its web app loader, so if you want to access web app classes from within server loaded classes, you'll need to use the web app thread's loader.

getMyClassLoader

public static java.lang.ClassLoader getMyClassLoader(java.lang.Object o)
Returns:
ClassLoader of the supplied object's class. If the loader is null than the class was loaded with the default system loader, so return the system class loader.

getMyClassLoader

public static java.lang.ClassLoader getMyClassLoader(java.lang.Class objectClass)
Returns:
ClassLoader for this class. If the loader is null than the class was loaded with the default system loader, so return the system class loader.

getSystemClassLoader

public static java.lang.ClassLoader getSystemClassLoader()
Returns:
System loader, used to bootstrap the VM (?)
